official_title: A bill to amend the Narcotic Addict Rehabilitation Act of 1966, and for other purposes.

summary.text: Repeals titles I, III, and IV of the Narcotic Addict Rehabilitation Act of 1966. (Title I provides for the civil commitment of narcotic addicts in lieu of criminal prosecution; title III permits such persons not charged with a crime to petition for civil commitment; and title IV authorizes the Surgeon General to establish outpatient services to treat drug addiction).
